pages.title: Making Ice Cream
pages.text: To make ice cream, you need a cauldron filled with Powder Snow, as a base.

pages.title: Syrup
pages.text: Syrups are the base of every ice cream flavor. To create them, you place Milk, Sugar and another ingredient in a crafting table. The ingredient placed in determines the flavor of your syrup.$(br2)After you create a syrup, just right click your powder snow cauldron, and you get one filled with ice cream!

pages.title: Building Ice Cream
pages.text: Why stop at 1 scoop? You can make your Ice Cream have up to 3 balls of ice cream in any flavor you want!$(br2)To do so, simply click on an ice cream filled cauldron with the ice cream to add another ball.
